com.zebra.sdk.common.card.printer.discovery

Class NetworkDiscoveryConfiguration

  • Object
    • com.zebra.sdk.common.card.printer.discovery.NetworkDiscoveryConfiguration

  • public class NetworkDiscoveryConfiguration
extends Object
    A class used to set/get the network card printer discovery parameters.

                          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the network discovery configuration parameters.
        Parameters:
        discoveryConfiguration - the network discovery configuration parameters.
        Throws:
